metadata.title: CVE-2018-17098 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The WavFileBase class in WavFile.cpp in Olli Parviainen SoundTouch 2.0allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap corruption fromsize inconsistency) or possibly have unspecified other impact, asdemonstrated by SoundStretch.

criterions.comment: soundtouch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
